snippet: A foundation is in place to begin the effort to create a presidential library with Barack Obama’s name on it. Where it will be built remains unclear.
abstract: Pres Obama's supporters kick off the Barack H Obama Foundation, administration-blessed organization to find the money and address for an eventual Obama library; foundation is led by Marty Nesbitt, Chicago investor and Obama friend, along with businessman J Kevin Poorman and fund-raiser Julianna Smoot.
lead_paragraph: A foundation is in place to begin the effort to create a presidential library with Barack Obama’s name on it. Where it will be built remains unclear.

headline.main: A Library for Obama First Needs an Address
headline.print_headline: A Library for Obama First Needs an Address
